ai-patthana11.8:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in MN 4.)

ai-patthana11.8:3.1_0: Unskilled in the ear ... nose ... tongue ... body ...

ai-patthana11.8:4.1_4: is ignorant of the Holy One.
